author: pieterdavid
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22982. Two small changes in the filling of the SiStripEventSummary that should only affect calibration runs.
If I understood @rgerosa correctly it is not strictly needed to backport this, but, if picked up by a release soon, it would be nice to have (such that he does not need to apply patches to analyse P5 runs).
title: [10_1_X] SiStripEventSummary fixes for special runs in local-DAQ
